lead_paragraph: BEREN--Joan Schiff. The Yeshiva University family is saddened by the passing of Joan Schiff Beren, Z"l, a longtime friend of our institution. Sincere condolences are expressed to her loving children: Amy (and Bob) Bressman, Adam (and Ellen) Beren, Nancy Beren (and Dr. Larry) Jefferson and Julie (and Marc) Platt, her adoring 14 grandchildren and five great-grandchildren. May the entire family find comfort among all who mourn for Zion and Jerusalem. Richard M. Joel, President, Yeshiva University Norman Lamm, President Emeritus 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BEREN, JOAN SCHIFF
